item.description:
This event is co-posted to the Fun with Alcohol meet up.
Disclaimer: this isn't a promotion, this is merely informational.

In case you can't find the group right away, go to the designated area & ask, ARE YOU WITH THE MEETUP? That is always a good conversation starter.

GO, PATS!!

NOTE-- after the game there is dancin' but if you arrive late (after 9 ish) you'll likely be paying a cover, game or no game.

Watch this Pats playoff game on a BIG projector screen (approx 10' by 6'). Get there on time to get your seats! And Meetup-- before it gets loud! Yes, there are lotsa other screens, too. ALSO...

there are game specials but get your orders in ASAP, I mean ASAP, it will fill up fast, then kitchen busy & waitstaff not be able to find you. Reportedly 50 cent wings, flat bread pizzas $5, "Gronk Dog" $8 & the "Brady Special" $12 (includes drink).

LINK! --
http://www.facebook.com/thePhoenixLanding
...scroll down to see references to this football game! On the right.

Please bring cash.
item.how_to_find_us: Try to nab seats at one of the tall tables closer to the entrance
item.name: N.E. Patriots Football Plus App. Specials, CAMBRIDGE
